step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Excellent! You're maintaining good form as you complete the circular motion. Remember to breathe deeply as you pull your shoulders back.
Great work completing all repetitions! You've successfully performed the shoulder rolls, focusing on the circular movement and squeezing your shoulder blades.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to keep the circular motion smooth and controlled. Squeeze your shoulder blades back and down with each roll to help improve your shoulder mobility.
